quote: I am hope.
author: Neil Gaiman,  The Sandman, Vol. 1: Preludes and Nocturnes

quote: Just hope. Hope is filled with power.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Hope is a waking dream.
author: Aristotle

quote: Hope attracts chances.
author: Toba Beta,  My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: My hopes are not always realized, but I always hope.
author: Ovid

quote: Hope is holding on to the promises of God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita,  The Wings of Hope: Survivor

quote: hope for the best, prepare for the worst
author: Chris Bradford,  The Ring of Earth

quote: Once you choose hope, anything's possible.
author: Christopher Reeve

quote: Hope is a risk that must be run.
author: Georges Bernanos

quote: Hope opens the door of opportunity and shines the way to possibilities.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Hope is possible, when you decide to believe that what you are hoping for is possible.
author: Patti Snodgrass

quote: with my last Breathe,i will hope,for i know my hope is placed in the right place.
author: Jonathan Eriah

quote: Hope is but the dream of those who wake.
author: Matthew Prior

quote: I hope for happiness for you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Hope costs nothing.
author: Colette

quote: Hope burns eternal in the human heart.
author: O.R. Melling

quote: To wish was to hope, and to hope was to expect
author: Jane Austen,  Sense and Sensibility

quote: I said to my soul, be still, and wait without hope, For hope would be hope for the wrong thing.
author: T. S. Eliot

quote: Hope may have a positive reputation, but it has a vicious downside. If you have hope, you can be crushed.
author: Ann Napolitano,  A Good Hard Look

quote: It is stupid to hope, but sometimes hope is all you have.
author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Lost Souls

quote: Hope will never be silent.
author: Harvey Milk

quote: Hope is sweet.Hope is illumining.Hope is fulfilling.Hope can be everlasting.Therefore, do not give up hope,Even in the sunset of your life.
author: Sri Chinmoy,  My Life's Soul-Journey: Daily Meditations for Ever-Increasing Spiritual Fulfillment

quote: Hope is the heartbeat of the soul~
author: Michelle Horst

quote: Hope can get you through anything.
author: Jamie Ford,  Hotel on the Corner of Bitter and Sweet

quote: I have spoken words of hope. But only of hope. Hope is not victory.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien,  The Two Towers

quote: Even if the hopes you started out with are dashed, hope has to be maintained.
author: Seamus Heaney

quote: Hope keeps you alive.
author: Lauren Oliver,  Before I Fall

quote: While there's life, there's hope.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Beware how you take away hope from another human being.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: I am prepared for the worst, but hope for the best.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: At the moment of death I hope to be surprised.
author: Ivan Illich

quote: Hope is the power of being cheerful in circumstances that we know to be desperate.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: As long as there's life, there's hope.
author: Tamora Pierce

quote: Hope is such a beautiful word, but it often seems very fragile. Life is still being needlessly hurt and destroyed.
author: Michael Jackson

quote: We really feel happier when things look bleak. Hope is endurance. Hope is holding on and going on and trusting in the Lord.
author: Michael Novak

quote: Beware how you take away hope from another human being
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.

quote: Hope knows no fear.Hope dares to blossom even inside the abysmal abyss.Hope secretly feeds and strengthens promise.
author: Sri Chinmoy

quote: Hope is the feeling we have that the feeling we have is not permanent.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: While the heart beats, hope lingers.
author: Alison Croggon

quote: I have hope for you, if only because you're the only one left to hope for.
author: Orson Scott Card,  Ender's Game

quote: Hope is a talent like any other.
author: Storm Jameson

quote: Hope fills the holes of my frustration in my heart.
author: Emanuel Cleaver

quote: Hope is the last thing a person does before they are defeated.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: Don't ever lose hope because better days will come.
author: Ana Monnar

quote: Hope is tomorrow's veneer over today's disappointment.
author: Evan Esar

quote: It seems as if life and hope must cease together.
author: Anne Bronte

quote: Hope does not leave without being given permission.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Never loose hope. Stay strong, you never know what tomorrow brings.
author: Magith Noohukhan

quote: Hope, the best comfort of our imperfect condition.
author: Edward Gibbon

quote: We need hope, or else we cannot endure.
author: Sarah J. Maas,  A Court of Thorns and Roses
